message: Since symfony/dependency-injection 6.3: Relying on the "@required" annotation on method "App\Infrastructure\Bridge\GraphQL\Mutation\AbstractMutation::setContainer()" is deprecated, use the "Symfony\Contracts\Service\Attribute\Required" attribute instead.

Since symfony/dependency-injection 6.3: Relying on the "@required" annotation on method "App\Infrastructure\Bridge\GraphQL\Resolver\AbstractResolver::setContainer()" is deprecated, use the "Symfony\Contracts\Service\Attribute\Required" attribute instead.
The "App\Infrastructure\Test\Listener\UpdateExpectationsGuardListener" class implements "PHPUnit\Framework\TestListener" that is deprecated.
The "App\Infrastructure\Test\Listener\UpdateExpectationsGuardListener" class uses "PHPUnit\Framework\TestListenerDefaultImplementation" that is deprecated The `TestListener` interface is deprecated.
The "App\Infrastructure\Test\Listener\SymfonyDebugModeListener" class implements "PHPUnit\Framework\TestListener" that is deprecated.
The "App\Infrastructure\Test\Listener\SymfonyDebugModeListener" class uses "PHPUnit\Framework\TestListenerDefaultImplementation" that is deprecated The `TestListener` interface is deprecated.
Since doctrine/doctrine-bundle 2.2: The "Doctrine\Bundle\DoctrineBundle\Command\Proxy\RunSqlDoctrineCommand" (doctrine:query:sql) is deprecated, use dbal:run-sql command instead.
The "Monolog\Logger" class is considered final. It may change without further notice as of its next major version. You should not extend it from "Symfony\Bridge\Monolog\Logger".

The "Symfony\Component\DependencyInjection\Argument\LazyClosure" class is considered internal. It may change without further notice. You should not use it from "Symfony\Component\DependencyInjection\Argument\LazyClosure@anonymous".
